homePage.title: A premium coffee for unique moments
homePage.description: Experience unforgettable moments with every cup of our coffee.

about_us.title: About Us
about_us.description: At Entopias Caf√©, we live the passion for good coffee. We select high-quality beans directly from producers, ensuring authenticity and flavor in every cup. We focus on highlighting the best characteristics of each harvest through a careful process that guarantees freshness and excellence. More than a brand, we are a community that celebrates the coffee tradition, connecting coffee lovers with unique and authentic experiences.

our_products.title: Our Products
our_products.description: Explore our range of products designed to meet your needs.

customer_service.title: Customer Service
customer_service.description: We provide high-quality service to our customers

delivery.title: National and international shipping
delivery.description: We ship our coffee around the world

chatbot.title: Interact with our chatbot
chatbot.description: Discover which coffee is ideal for you

homePage.us_coffee_1: Our special coffee is a sensory journey that awakens the senses with unique flavors and aromas.
homePage.us_coffee_2: Each sip is a morning hug that brightens the day with sweet and toasted notes, creating a comforting ritual that fills you with energy and joy from the first aroma to the last sip.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We are here to help you. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to us.
